fr.umlv.wallj.game

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.umlv.wallj.game.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    The main class of the game. It contains everything needed in the game, and its methods. The level field is the number of the current level. The board field is the current board of the game. It has the grid and the Jbox2D world. The disp field is the displayer of the game, that will draw evrything of the game. The path field is the the path between the player and its destination. The keyboardKeyMap field is the map of key used for the keyboard events. The victory fields tell if the game is currently won. The pos field is the current position of the player. The dest field is the current destination of the player. These two last fields are used by the A* algorithm, and thus must be Nodes.
    Author:
    Severin Gosset - Denis Biguenet

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Game()
      Create a new game by initializing the map of keys used for the events.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game()
        Create a new game by initializing the map of keys used for the events.

    • Method Detail

      • nextLevel

        public void nextLevel(int level,
                      fr.umlv.zen5.ApplicationContext context)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Initialize the next level of the game, by creating the board and the displayer of the current level.
        Parameters:
        level - the number of the current level.
        context - the application context in which the level will be drawn.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the next level doesn't exisrs, or another IOException occurs.

      • setFirstPlayerPos

        public void setFirstPlayerPos()
        Sets the position of the player, when it is not on the board. Waits a click and places the player in the position.

      • refresh

        public boolean refresh()
        Runs once the main loop of the first part of the game. Waits an event : if it's a click, moves the player to the position, if it's 'B', drops a Bomb, if it's 'F', triggers all the bombs.
        Returns:
        false if the loop must be stopped (the user pressed 'F'), true if not

      • physics

        public boolean physics()
        Runs once the main loop of the second partof the game. Launches the physic : Run the Bomb and the world. Destroy all the garbage that hit a trashcan. May also takes an event : If all the garbages are gone, stops the loop and set victory flag to true. If the user press a keyboard button, stops the loop. Else, does not stop the loop.
        Returns:
        if the loop must continue.

      • setPhysics

        public void setPhysics()
        Sets up the physic of the game : Remove the garbage from the board's grid

      • endGame

        public boolean endGame()
        Makes the game end, by drawing the defeat or victory messages, and waiting for a key to be pressed.
        Returns:
        if game is won.
